data.eml:eml: Two new species of the genus Metaxonchium Coomans & Nair, 1975 (Nematoda, Dorylaimida, Belondiridae) from Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nguyen, Thi Anh Duong, Peña-Santiago, Reyes (2018): Two new species of the genus Metaxonchium Coomans & Nair, 1975 (Nematoda, Dorylaimida, Belondiridae) from Vietnam. Zootaxa 4415 (1): 150-160, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4415.1.7
